name: Oasis Kingdom DEMO
description: My name is Alex and I'm a Software Developer with a B.S in Computer Science.  One of my greatest passions are video games I have spent a lot of time developing games in C++, JAVA and C#. Some of these games have been from scratch and others using engines such as Unity and Unreal. I have always had the dream to create a 3D turn based games where you must think about tactics in order to win. Basically this game is similar to chess, just with cool animations and features. To contact me or see my portfolio visit: F4code.com
